root.shorttitle: Event On Post Gameplay Effect Execute
root.fulltitle: Event On Post Gameplay Effect Execute
root.description:
PostGameplayEffectExecute event fired off from native AttributeSets, define here any attribute change specific management you are not doing in c++ (like clamp)
Only triggers after changes to the BaseValue of an Attribute from a GameplayEffect.

param.name: Source Character
param.description: The instigator Character that started the whole chain (in case of damage, that would be the damage causer

param.name: Target Character
param.description: The owner Character to which the Attribute change is applied

param.name: Source Tags
param.description: The aggregated SourceTags for this EffectSpec

param.name: Payload
param.description: Payload information with the original AttributeSet, the owning AbilitySystemComponent, calculated DeltaValue and the ClampMinimumValue from config if defined
